location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informing that some privates and soldiers were sent to provide relief in Persia, and requesting Bruce to send them to Tehran [Tehran] after their arrival in Bushire.
